ema nisa papwahansege sancharaya sidu kerena janawari masaye janadhipathiwaranayak ho maha mathiwaranayak pawathwima nusudusu bawa janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahathata danumdun bawada unwahanse pawasuha.

padukka - kolambaa pradhana margaye palam rasak abalanwa athi bawa dinamina puwath pathe puwatha palawimen anathuruwa margaye abalan palam sadimata piyawara gena atha.me yatathe prathamayen wasara hayaka pamana kalayaka sita abalanwa pawathi padukka liyanwala pusalioya palama sadime katayuthu aarambha kara thibe.dinapatha wishala ratha wahana sankhyawak gaman ganna me margaye wasara hayaka pamana kalayaka sita padukka liyanwala pusalioya palama saha godagama nagarayata aasannawa pihiti rathambaalahena palama kadi athi bawa dinamina puwath pathe wistharathmakawa puwatha pala wimen anathuruwa dina kipayakthula adala aayathana pusali oya palama idi kirimata piyawara gena athayi liyanwala janathawa pawasathi.liyanwala palame idikirim karana nisawen rathri kalayedi eya riyaduranta pahadiliwa handunaganimata anathurak wimata pera marga depasa marga sangnya puwaruwak sawi karana lesa janathawa adala aayathanawalin illimak kere..
